titleStmt.title: A letter from the Lady Creswell to Madam C., the midwife, on the publishing her late vindication, &c. also, A whip for impudence, or, A lashing repartee to the snarling midwifes matchless rogue, being an answer to the rayling libel.
titleStmt.author: Creswell, Lady.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: From the ancient place of my habitation, Sept. 1680 ... Creswell.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
